## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [init(request)](./smokeball-client-sdk.common.api.init.md) | Initializes a session for communication with Smokeball. Also sets the session context.<!-- -->The matterId is set in the context when initialized in a matter window. |
